Description: Body and handle sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed black (fired reddish); exterior: bands above and below handle zone; top and outside of handle glazed; on either side of handle, group of vertical lines.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1113) (phase 2)
